results.title: Radiation Increases Bioavailability of Lisinopril, a Mitigator of Radiation-Induced Toxicities
results.text_hl: Radiation Increases Bioavailability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@, a Mitigator of @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Radiation_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009381 @@@Radiation-Induced Toxicities@@@

citations.NLM: Medhora M, Phadnis P, Narayanan J, Gasperetti T, Zielonka J, Moulder JE, Fish BL, Szabo A. Radiation Increases Bioavailability of Lisinopril, a Mitigator of Radiation-Induced Toxicities Front Pharmacol. 2021;12():646076. PMID: 33986677

results.title: Optical Metabolic Imaging for Assessment of Radiation-Induced Injury to Rat Kidney and Mitigation by Lisinopril.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, the mitigating effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisino@@@), an anti-@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@angiotensin converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor, is assessed in @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Radiation_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009381 @@@renal radiation-induced injuries@@@.

citations.NLM: Mehrvar S, la Cour MF, Medhora M, Camara AKS, Ranji M. Optical Metabolic Imaging for Assessment of Radiation-Induced Injury to Rat Kidney and Mitigation by Lisinopril. Ann Biomed Eng. 2019 Jul;47(7):1564-1574. PMID: 30963380

results.title: Early-Onset Bilateral Severe Valvular Regurgitation After Mediastinal Radiotherapy in Hodgkin Lymphoma Survivors: Should We Screen Prior to 10 Years After Mediastinal Radiotherapy?
results.text_hl: We review the literature, discuss the risk factors and determinants of developing @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Radiation_Induced</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009381 @@@RIV@@@, and suggest the ideal timing to screen @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Mishra T, Ahmed A, Shokr M, Rashed A, Yassin AS, Kottam A. Early-Onset Bilateral Severe Valvular Regurgitation After Mediastinal Radiotherapy in Hodgkin Lymphoma Survivors: Should We Screen Prior to 10 Years After Mediastinal Radiotherapy? Ochsner J. 2019 Fall;19(3):252-255. PMID: 31528137
